links.title: WATCH LIVE: SpaceX to Launch Falcon 9 Rocket #PAZmission @9:17am EST
links.description: SpaceX will debut an upgraded payload fairing for the Falcon 9 rocket when they return to action with the launch of Spain's Paz satellite from Vandenberg Air Force Base. The launch, which will also carry the first demonstration satellites for SpaceX's own satellite internet constellation, is targeting an instantaneous launch opportunity at 06:17 Pacific Time (14:17 UTC).
